definition: to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition

pinyin: Tai2 bei3 Jin1 ma3 Ying3 zhan3

sentences.english: There's a film festival beginning tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 明天有一个电影展要召开了。

sentences.english: Maybe that’s why Chongqing Blues failed.
sentences.chinese: 也许这正是《日照重庆》影展失利的原因。

sentences.english: Learn how to book films to show in this free video guide to operating a movie theater.
sentences.chinese: 了解如何预订电影展现在此免费视频教程经营电影院。

sentences.english: The Hyatt Hotel, the venue for the film festival, is fully packed this week.
sentences.chinese: 这次影展的场地凯越饭店在这整周是充满了人的。

sentences.english: Miriam Salek, the Minister of Culture for the Western Saharan administration, highlights the festival's importance.
sentences.chinese: 西撒哈拉文化局长指出影展的重要性。
主要的国际影展中备受尊敬。

sentences.english: Their films have won more awards at international festivals than any other nation.
sentences.chinese: 其作品获得的国际影展大奖数量远远胜于其他国家。

sentences.english: The response to the exhibition has been “overwhelmingly positive,” said Willis.
sentences.chinese: 威利斯说，人们对这次摄影展反响非常积极。

sentences.english: He has taken exhibitions and published books of pictures about Italy and Japan.
sentences.chinese: 他举办过摄影展，出版过关于意大利和日本的摄影集。

sentences.english: CCC is planning a photo exhibition in January 2011.
sentences.chinese: 华社定于2011年一月举办摄影展。

sentences.english: In short the photographic exhibition can get the students to discover and appreciate beauty.
sentences.chinese: 简言之，摄影展能够让同学发现和欣赏美。

sentences.english: Berlin film festival's judges appreciate highly the film performed by Amber.
sentences.chinese: 柏林电影展的评委们对郭采洁主演的电影评价很高。

sentences.english: A photographic exhibition of key photographers who have worked with Yohji Yamamoto.
sentences.chinese: 一个关键的摄影师摄影展谁曾与山本耀司。

sentences.english: I do not know why women like photography so much.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道女人怎么会那么喜欢摄影展。

sentences.english: Painting and Calligraphy Exhibition in Xian'ning city, central China's Hubei province.
sentences.chinese: 咸宁市廉政书画影展在金叶体育馆展出。

sentences.english: Around 50 works are entered in the Berlinale's Panorama section.
sentences.chinese: 预计约有50部电影作品将角逐柏林影展。

definition: to premiere (a movie or TV show)/premiere (of a movie)/first-run (movie)/to greet (the eye) before anything else (e.g. when entering a room)

pinyin: Tai2 bei3 Jin1 ma3 Ying3 zhan3
Ao4 si1 ka3 jin1 xiang4 jiang3
Xiang1 gang3 Wen2 hua4 Zhong1 xin1
